product_name: Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri Shorts - Women's
long_description: Train and race in the comfort of the Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri shorts. Compression fabric provides optimum muscle support, reducing fatigue and extending endurance. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric protects skin from damaging sunlight with a UPF rating of 50+. Flatlock seams reduce chafing no matter if you're running, biking or swimming. Elastic hems and silicone grippers help shorts stay in place. A quick-drying chamois pad boosts your comfort in the saddle. Wide waistband with a flat, stretchy drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Envelope pocket stores energy food. Reflective accents increase visibility in dim light. Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri shorts are formfitting.
short_description: Train and race in the comfort of the Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri shorts.
